Not knowing a lot about the various options out there, is there an interface
description language that is being used to describe RESTful interfaces?  For
instance, I'd like to be able to convey something like the following:


GET,HEAD
    Content-Type: text/html
    Content-Type: text/rss+xml
POST
    Accept: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
    Accept: text/rss+xml


Ideally, I'd like to describe the allowed format of request entities, but
that's a tall order, I'm sure.  So, any pointers?  Suggestions?
